intro: Coussapoa magnifolia var. glabrescens, commonly known as the smooth-leaved magnolia, is a tropical evergreen tree native to the rainforests of South America. It is characterized by its large, showy, white to pale pink flowers that bloom in the summer. The leaves are革质 (leathery) and smooth, giving the plant its varietal name. It typically grows to a height of 10–20 meters and is often found in humid, shaded environments.
